meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jay Jurkowitz Mike Horner Tom Nosek Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1880.

td.p: Jay Jurkowitz, a neurologist originally from Scranton, Pennsylvania
Mike Horner, a music agent originally from Washington, D.C.
Tom Nosek, an aerospace engineer originally from Chicago, Illinois (whose 3-day cash winnings total $43,800)

tr.td: FAMOUS GEMINIS
COOKING
ANIMAL GROUPS
EUROPEAN HISTORY
MOVIE MISSES
CALL ME "MR."

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

Mike
')

Mr. McGregor

TomMike
')
